title: A Jewelry shop
details: A Jewelry shop offers jewelry items to users. In order to place an order, a user needs to be authenticated. After login, the user will find a dashboard. He can see the order status and cancel the order. Also, the user can review with rating and contact to the shop owner using a contact form. An admin can manage users role, orders, and product.
description: A single page application featuring jewelry products, order page, user reviews, and contact form
User authentication is required to access user role-based dashboard
If the uses intended to go any private route (i.e. place order) without login, They will be redirected to login.
After login the user will be redirected to the page where he intended to go
A logged-in user can cancel an order and leave a review with star rating
Admin can manage user roles, products, and orders.
Deployed to firebase
Collections were created(products, users, reviews, orders, contacts ) in the backend
CRUD operation performed for different api's
JWT token used to protect the api for make admin route
Deployed to heroku
Mobile responsive
Admin access email: admin@admin.com password: 123456

title: Happy Events
details: A holiday event booking website that offers different events. In order to purchase an event user needs to be authenticated, And authenticated user can manage orders(CRUD operation) and create team member. All CRUD API's created using express.js
description: A holiday event booking website which offers different events
A user can place order
Unauthenticated user only can see the services, home page
An authenticated user can place order using their information
An authenticated user can add service, team member, place order, change order status, delete order , delete services and other crud operation
User will be redirected to the page after authentication
Mongodb database connected with the server in the backened
Create, Read, Delete and Update operation performed
Deployed in heroku
Mobile responsive

title: Animal Doctor
details: A service website that provides different services for animals. A user will get necessary information about the service in service details page. The pricing table is also displayed.
description: A service website shows services and pricing
Custom hook and Context API is used to make available the users to all the routed
Google login implemented as well as traditional email and password login and registration
Firebase authentication enabled using Email/Password and Google.
Private route is implemented for contact, pricing and service details page
After reloading the page on a private route, the user was redirected to the login page.
Mobile responsive

title: My Portfolio website
details: This portfolio website to showcase my skills and experience
